name: Jumpin Ninja! - Very Fun and Addictive Game
name_original: Jumpin Ninja! - Very Fun and Addictive Game
description:
Jumpin Ninja! is a simple and very addicting game about a very cute ninja who loves to jump off walls!

Every time you jump off a wall, you receive a point.

Tap the screen to avoid the spikes and see how far you can go!

Enjoy!
